groupInformation.terms:
Check-in/Check-out Policies
This property has the following check-in and check-out times and policies:


Check-In: 2:00 PM - 8:30 PM

Check-Out: 10:00 AM

Your reservation is guaranteed until the day of arrival. After thattime, it will no longer be guaranteed and the room may be reassigned.
We will charge your first night rate to the credit card you provided within 72 hours prior to check-in 
The hotel has the right to cancel your reservation if we do notreceive the Pre-Payment Deposit or invalid credit card.

Children of any age arewelcome.Children aged 3 years andabove are considered adults at this property.
Cots and extra beds arenot available at this property.
Pets are not allowed.
Visitors must report to our reception and obtain permission. Adhering to our visitor rules is a requirement.

What we are not allowed:

Illegal and non-prescribed drugs
Weapons
Gambling
Unauthorised animals
Smoking within the hostel building
Theft of other guestsâ€™ or Astray Motel and Backpackers' property
Noisy, disorderly or abusive behaviour or physical violence
Damage to hostel property
Discriminatory behaviour
Ifyour behaviour is highly offensive, the Astray Motel Manager may require you to leavethe hostel immediately without a refund.If you damage any hostel property, we will charge your creditcard for the cost of the repairs.
Your reservation is guaranteed until the day of arrival.After that time, it will no longer be guaranteed and the room may be reassigned.
groupInformation.cancellationTerms:
Property and Cancellation Policies :
This is largely based on seasonalities, for details please Email us on reservations@astray.co.nz.

houseRules.notes:
Rules & Cancellation Policy:
All standard bookings are subject to free cancellation up until 48 hours before the latest check in time.
Failure to show for your reservation or a cancellation less than 48 hours may result in a charge on your method of payment up to the amount of your first night's stay.

Your reservation is guaranteed until the day of arrival. After that time, it will no longer be guaranteed and the room may be reassigned.

Check out is from 10am daily

Children of any age are welcome. Children aged 3 years and above are considered adults at this property.
Cots and extra beds are not available at this property.

Pets are not allowed.

Visitors must report to our reception and obtain permission. Adhering to our visitor rules is a requirement.

What we are not allowed:

Illegal and non-prescribed drugs
Weapons
Gambling
Unauthorised animals
Smoking within the hostel building
Theft of other guests or Astray Motel and Backpackers' property
Noisy, disorderly or abusive behaviour or physical violence
Damage to hostel property
Discriminatory behaviour
If your behaviour is highly offensive, the Astray Motel Manager may require you to leave the hostel immediately without a refund.If you damage any hostel property, we will charge your credit card for the cost of the repairs.
Cancellation policy: 48h before arrival. In case of a late cancellation or No Show, you will be charged the first night of your stay.
Check in from 14:00 to 21:00 .
Check out from 00:00 to 00:00 .
Taxes included.
Breakfast included.
No curfew.
